alert.note: Alert for Riverside; San Diego (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 16 at 4:31PM PDT until August 16 at 5:00PM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Diego has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Riverside County in southern California... Northern San Diego County in southwestern California... * Until 500 PM PDT. * At 430 PM PDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hwy 79 Between Warner Springs And Oak Grove, or 10 miles south of Anza, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Hwy 79 Between Oak Grove And Aguanga, Hwy 79 Between Warner Springs And Oak Grove, Aguanga, Oak Grove, and Cahuilla Indian Reservation. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
